languages.text: "Еще мы помним день, когда пропала звезда. Когда темный свет и сытый голод хотели забрать мир. Райкад Минорис — так он звался в базах корабля".
"We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."
languages.original_text: "Еще мы помним день, когда пропала звезда. Когда темный свет и сытый голод хотели забрать мир. Райкад Минорис — так он звался в базах корабля".

traits.locale_text: "We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."
"We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."
"We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."

"We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."
"We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."

languages.text: « Nous nous souvenons du jour où l'étoile a disparu, où la lumière sombre et la faim rassasiée voulaient s'emparer du monde. D'après les données du vaisseau, Rykad Minoris était son nom. »
languages.original_text: "We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous souvenons du jour où l'étoile a disparu, où la lumière sombre et la faim rassasiée voulaient s'emparer du monde. D'après les données du vaisseau, Rykad Minoris était son nom. »

languages.text: “我们记得星星消失的那天，黑暗之光与餍足饥渴想要夺走那个世界。根据船上的数据记载，那个世界的名字是小莱卡德。”
languages.original_text: "We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."

traits.locale_text: “我们记得星星消失的那天，黑暗之光与餍足饥渴想要夺走那个世界。根据船上的数据记载，那个世界的名字是小莱卡德。”

languages.text: "Wir erinnern uns an den Tag, an dem der Stern verschwunden ist. Als das dunkle Licht und der gesättigte Hunger die Welt erobern wollten. Rykad Minoris war ihr Name in den Daten des Schiffs."
languages.original_text: "We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."

traits.locale_text: "Wir erinnern uns an den Tag, an dem der Stern verschwunden ist. Als das dunkle Licht und der gesättigte Hunger die Welt erobern wollten. Rykad Minoris war ihr Name in den Daten des Schiffs."

languages.text: «Recordamos el día que desapareció la luz. Cuando la luz oscura y el hambre satisfecha quisieron dominar el mundo. En los datos de la nave aparecía como Rykad Minoris».
languages.original_text: "We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."

traits.locale_text: «Recordamos el día que desapareció la luz. Cuando la luz oscura y el hambre satisfecha quisieron dominar el mundo. En los datos de la nave aparecía como Rykad Minoris».

languages.text: 「私たちは星が消えた日を覚えている。暗い光と満たされた飢えが惑星を覆いつくそうとしたときのことを。その星の名は、船のデータ上ではライカド・ミノリスという名称だった」
languages.original_text: "We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは星が消えた日を覚えている。暗い光と満たされた飢えが惑星を覆いつくそうとしたときのことを。その星の名は、船のデータ上ではライカド・ミノリスという名称だった」

languages.text: "Yıldızın kaybolduğu, karanlık ışık ile doygun açlığın dünyayı yutmak istediği günü hatırlıyoruz. Dünyanın adı, geminin verilerinde Rykad Minoris olarak geçiyordu."
languages.original_text: "We remember the day when the star disappeared. When the dark light and the sated hunger wanted to take the world. Rykad Minoris was its name in the ship's data."

traits.locale_text: "Yıldızın kaybolduğu, karanlık ışık ile doygun açlığın dünyayı yutmak istediği günü hatırlıyoruz. Geminin verilerinde Rykad Minoris olarak geçiyordu adı."
